name: Jane's Combat Simulations: F-15
description: Take the F-15E (Strike Eagle) and own the sky! Instant action gives you quick adrenaline fixes, while training missions teaches you the basics. When you're ready, wage war over authentic terrain of Iraq and Iran, over 3 million square miles! 3D accelerated visuals will amaze you! Radio chatter, authentic F-15 squadrons, missions based on actual Desert Storm sorties, and ability to play online on Jane's Combatnet are all in this ground-breaking package!
